author: Staff Reporter
text:
As many as 39 handloom societies are participating in the district-level Pongal Festival 2016, a handloom exhibition inaugurated at Sri Namagiriamman Tirumana Mandapam at Kulakkarai here.

Organised by the Development Commissioner for Handloom, Ministry of Textile and Department of Handloom and Textiles of the State Government, Collector V. Dakshinamoorthy inaugurated the exhibition in which handloom societies from Namakkal, Salem, Erode, Coimbatore, Dindigul and other districts are participating.

Handloom varieties on bed sheets, towels, dress materials, lungi, saris and towels are kept on display. Officials said that the sales target for the exhibition that would be on till January 13 had been fixed at Rs. 50 lakh. Last year, the exhibition fetched Rs. 73 lakh that exceeded the target of Rs. 50 lakh, they added. The officials said that handloom products worth Rs. 90 lakh were kept for sale.

Customers will get a special discount of 30 per cent on all purchases.
title: Handloom exhibition inaugurated
